import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; import firebaseDB from "./firebase"; function App(){ const [state, setState] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "", }); const { name, email, subject, message } = state; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!name || !email || !subject || !message) { toast.error("Please provide value in each input field"); } else { firebaseDB.child("contacts").push(state); setState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); toast.success("Form Submitted Successfully"); } }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { let { name, value } = e.target; setState({ ...state, [name]: value }); }; return(
